alert.note: Alert for Carson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 8:44PM CDT until May 18 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR CARSON COUNTY... At 844 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Panhandle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 842 PM CDT, trained spotters reported two inch diameter hail 2 miles west southwest of Pantex. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Panhandle, White Deer, Groom and Pantex. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
